title: ONLY THE FEDS I FEAR
itunes:title: ONLY THE FEDS I FEAR
description:
Charlamagne puts the entire Federal Bureau of Investigations under investigation. Plus, Charlamagne makes a case for completely removing one man’s name, J. Edgar Hoover, from the FBI building while also holding a competition to see who was American history’s top racist.

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
